title: Drawing, "Section of a wall, Tapestry Room, Palace of Fontainebleau", ca. 1885
medium: Brush and watercolor, Chinese white on heavy paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Lloyd S. Bryce
description: Elevation of section of wall, showing panelling and parts of large tapestries. Left, tapestry over mantelpiece. Right, side chair and commode.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Section of a wall, Tapestry Room, Palace of Fontainebleau", ca. 1885.
ca. 1885. Brush and watercolor, Chinese white on heavy paper. Gift of Mrs. Lloyd S. Bryce. 1896-29-27.
